mapper.sql: id, createid, content, status, publishTime, answerId
mapper.select: select q.id,q.content,date_format(q.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishTime,q.status,q.answerId,m.headShot, case WHEN m.identify = 2 THEN m.personRealName WHEN m.identify !=2 THEN m.enterpriseName end as memberName from t_e_question q LEFT JOIN t_m_member m on m.id = q.createid where q.id = #{id}

select q.id,q.content,date_format(q.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishTime,m.headShot from t_e_question q LEFT JOIN t_m_member m on m.id = q.createid where q.`status` = 1 and q.id not in (select a.questionId from t_e_answer a where a.createid = #{id} ) and q.createid != #{id} order by q.publishTime desc

select q.content as question,date_format(q.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') questionTime,m.headShot as questionImg, a.content as answer,date_format(a.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') answerTime,e.photoUrl as answerImg from t_e_answer a left join t_e_question q on a.questionId = q.id LEFT JOIN t_m_member m on m.id = q.createid LEFT JOIN t_e_expert e on e.createid = a.createid where a.createid = #{id} order by a.publishTime desc

select q.id,q.content,date_format(q.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishTime,q.status, (select count(*) from t_e_answer a where a.questionId = q.id)as size from t_e_question q where q.createid = #{id} order by q.publishTime desc

select q.id,q.content,date_format(q.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishTime,q.status, (select count(*) from t_e_answer a where a.questionId = q.id)as size, case WHEN m.identify = 2 THEN m.personRealName WHEN m.identify !=2 THEN m.enterpriseName end as memberName from t_e_question q LEFT JOIN t_m_member m on m.id = q.createid order by q.publishTime desc

select q.content as question,a.content as answer,date_format(a.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') publishTime,e.photoUrl,e.name from t_e_question q left join t_e_answer a on q.id = a.questionId left join t_e_expert e on e.createid = a.createid where q.`status` = 2 and a.`status` = 0 and q.answerId = a.id order by q.publishTime desc limit 0,#{count}
